sentences.sentence: He threw himself sorrowfully on the ground.
Presently he said sorrowfully, "Alack, how have I longed for this sweet hour!"
sentences.translation: 过了一会儿，他悲伤地说：“唉，我多么渴望这个甜蜜的时刻啊！”

sentences.sentence: As the raven drove along her four chestnut horses, she said sorrowfully to herself, "I know he has fallen asleep."
sentences.translation: 当乌鸦赶着四匹栗色的马向前走时，她悲伤地自言自语道：“我知道他睡着了。”
